name: Heat of the Moment (PalleMickzy)
description:
Your skin heats up as the seconds pass. Terrified roars escape your throat. The lava is approaching. Run!

Controls: WASD: Movement E: Melee attack Space: Jump

Created for the 2020 AIE Pre-Minor Production Game Jam 

Producer: Jason Cowdrey 

Designers/Programmer: Jonah Scanzon 

Designer/Music: Meilene Lin-Plebuch 

Character Artist: Molly Reusser 

Environmental Artist: Kedron De Groot 

Animator: Jose Sosa 

Programmer: Robert Garcia-Allen
